description: Don Speer  shared  Anonymous 's  video . I'm sorry to share something you've seen before but...I've been thinking just like this since I was a little kid, as far back as my memory began.  I had friends, acquaintances, neighbors, enemies, family, and that was it. There are no races of cows, dogs, and cats. Why do we label ourselves by the color of our skin?  It's lazy thinking, and I will never be like that. I see loving souls, and if I see something I like about you, I pick your brain and apply your talents into my life, because you are the best at that. We all have one life, so be the best person you can.

description: Jill Stein  was live. Welcome to tonight’s Fireside Chat. And we’ll talk about heroic resistance – how people are standing up, calling to cancel Puerto Rico’s debt, blocking Trump’s latest Muslim ban, pushing back against cuts to h ... ealth care, forcing another corrupt Trump nominee to withdraw, and mobilizing against WWIII on the Korean Peninsula.  Then we’ll hear from the only progressive in the New Jersey Governor’s race, Green Party powerhouse Seth Kaper-Dale. Seth will join us live from protests against a debate that outrageously locked out all candidates who raised less than $430,000. We’ll hear how Seth is refusing to be silenced in his fight for justice in a democracy sold to the highest bidder - in New Jersey as throughout our nation. Join the conversation. description: 335 Medical Evacuation Regiment Happy Birthday Your Majesty  Today is the official birthday of  HM Queen Elizabeth II , commander-in-chief of the  British Armed Forces .      Having joined the  British Army  in 1945, HRH Princess Elizabeth was trained as a driver and a mechanic, and is now the only surviving head of state to have served in the Second World War. ( World War II History )   Trooping the Colour  will be held in London this morning, and can be seen on  BBC One  from 10.15am.  The commanding officer, officers and soldiers of  335 Medical Evacuation Regiment  send Her Majesty the very best of wishes on her ninetieth birthday.    # QueenAt90   # GodSaveTheQueen  Video courtesy of  Slideshow "Metamorphosis" . comments.content: Quaking Aspen........beautiful and magnificent........the trunk looks like white birch........amazing facts.........as well as appealing to the eyes! According to  National Wildlife Federation ..........A grove of quaking aspens in Utah is the largest known living thing on Earth. Nearly 50,000 stems protrude from a single root system. The entire organism covers over 100 acres and weighs 6,000 tons!
The quaking aspen is my favorite tree and now it's even cooler.

In the Fishlake National Forest in Utah there is a colony of quaking aspen that is an estimated 80,000 years old, though no individual tree currently alive is anywhere near that age. Even the oldest non-clonal trees in the world, at some 4000+ years of age, don't approach the age of the root system of this organism, known as Pando, or the Trembling Giant.

In a properly seasoned cast iron pan, one that has been rubbed with oil and heated repeatedly, the oil has already broken down into a plastic-like substance that has bonded to the surface of the metal. This is what gives well-seasoned cast iron its non-stick properties, and as the material is no longer actually an oil, the surfactants in dish soap should not affect it.

Soap is actually ok. What you don't want on your pan is lye, an ingredient used to make soap.
